headline: JPMorgan Says the S&P 500 Has Limited Upside – but These 2 Stocks Stand Out
summary: Investors may be riding a wave of momentum, but one banking giant is urging a more cautious outlook for the broader market. Despite encouraging signals and ongoing strength in select areas, JPMorgan sees limited room for further gains in the S&P 500. The firm’s Global Markets Strategy team recently refined their market outlook for the months ahead, noting: “In the short term, the resilient macroeconomic outlook, coupled with the ‘higher for longer’ narrative and the reinforcement of the AI theme

headline: 2 Profitable Stocks to Target This Week and 1 to Brush Off
summary: Not all profitable companies are built to last - some rely on outdated models or unsustainable advantages. Just because a business is in the green today doesn’t mean it will thrive tomorrow.
